Accessibility Statement

Thorbis strives to deliver inclusive experiences across our platform and customer touchpoints. Accessibility is an ongoing priority.

Commitment

Thorbis is committed to providing accessible products and experiences for all users. Our goal is to comply with WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines across web and mobile interfaces.

Continuous improvement

We partner with accessibility experts, conduct audits, and include accessibility checks in our design and development process. Feedback from customers is essential to improving.

Request assistance

If you encounter accessibility barriers or need accommodations, email accessibility@thorbis.com or call +1 (415) 555-0134. We respond within one business day.
